NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library so you can set a profile picture or display them in your services.
NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera so you can take photos and use them in the app's features.
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We need permission to save images from the app to your gallery.
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need access to your current location in order to show you services near you or save your directions.
